vkifyfootersettdesc: You can always open this page via this link
vkifyrealvkifydesc: - trying to replace absolutely every OpenVK reference from page to «ВКонтакте» (WARNING! May replace something you shouldn't have, but looks cool, though)
vkifysupportedlinks: *any links to images are supported (.png, .gif, .jpg, etc)
vkifyflatplayerbtns: Use flatter buttons in the player
vkifyproxyvkemojidesc: Emojis will be cached on the server, and the missing ones will be downloaded from the Telegram server
vkifyverifiedpopup: This user's page is verified by VKontakte
vkifylflogin: Confirm connect on Last.fm, then press ОК
vkifyshowgift: Show last gift in left menu
vkifyscrobbleacc_help: If scrobbling is not working for you, try logging in again
vkifyabout: VKify - a small project that tries bring OpenVK's design closer to the VKontakte of the 2010s.
vkifyiglabel: Tracks with any attribute in this field will not be scrobbled. Each value must be separated by a comma and a space (Alo Sounds, OpenVK)
vkifystar_like: Use star instead heart in the like button
vkifyonline: Show online (site-wide) in the search bar
